00022 BdkDalitzHist::BdkDalitzHist(const char* name, const char* title,
00023                              BdkDalitzBase::Flavor flavor, BdkDalitzBase::Mode DdecMode,
00024                              RooAbsReal &m12, RooAbsReal &m13, const TH2& hist) :
00025   BdkDalitzBase(name,title,flavor,DdecMode),
00026   _m12("m12","Invariant Mass square of pi0 pi+",this,m12),
00027   _m13("m13","Invariant Mass square of pi0 pi-",this,m13),
00028   _hist(hist),
00029   _area(0)
00030 {
00031 }
00032 
00034 BdkDalitzHist::BdkDalitzHist(const BdkDalitzHist& other, const char* name) :
00035   BdkDalitzBase(other, name),
00036   _m12("m12",this,other._m12),
00037   _m13("m13",this,other._m13),
00038   _hist(other._hist)
00039 {
00040   if (other._area) _area = (TH2*)other._area->Clone(name+TString(".area"));
00041   else _area = 0;
00042 }
00043 
00045 BdkDalitzHist::~BdkDalitzHist()
00046 {
00047   delete _area;
00048 }
00049 
00051 Double_t BdkDalitzHist::evaluate() const
00052 {
00053   if (inDalitz(_m12,_m13))
00054     return _hist.GetBinContent(((TH2&)_hist).FindBin(_m12,_m13));
00055   else
00056     return 0;
00057 }
00058 
00059 
00060 Int_t BdkDalitzHist::getAnalyticalIntegral(RooArgSet& allVars, RooArgSet& analVars,
00061                                            const char* rangeName) const
00062 {
00063   // Only analytical integrals over the full range are defined
00064   if (rangeName!=0) return 0;
00065 
00066   if (matchArgs(allVars,analVars,_m12,_m13)) return 1;
00067   if (matchArgs(allVars,analVars,_m12)) return 2;
00068   if (matchArgs(allVars,analVars,_m13)) return 3;
00069 
00070   return 0;
00071 }
00072 
00073 
00074 Double_t BdkDalitzHist::analyticalIntegral(Int_t code, const char* /*rangeName*/) const 
00075 {
00076   Double_t r = 0;
00077 
00078   // Simplest scenario, integration over all dependents
00079   if (code==1) {
00080     if (!_area) {
00081       // Calculate area of each bin and store in separate histogram
00082       _area = (TH2*)_hist.Clone(GetName()+TString(".area"));
00083       weightBins(_area, kFALSE);
00084     }
00085     for (Int_t xbin=1; xbin<=_hist.GetNbinsX(); xbin++) {
00086       for (Int_t ybin=1; ybin<=_hist.GetNbinsY(); ybin++) {        
00087         r += _hist.GetBinContent(xbin,ybin) * _area->GetBinContent(xbin,ybin);
00088       }
00089     }
00090   }
00091   else if (code==2) {
00092       // Dalitz boundaries
00093     Double_t max = m12Max(_m13);
00094     Double_t min = m12Min(_m13);
00095     if (max==0 || min==0) return 0;  // not in Dalitz region
00096 
00097     Double_t m12VetoMin = -1;
00098     Double_t m12VetoMax = -1;
00099     if (hasM23Veto()) {
00100       // Veto window boundaries in m13
00101       m12VetoMin = mOtherVal(_m13, m23VetoMax());
00102       m12VetoMax = mOtherVal(_m13, m23VetoMin());
00103       // Is veto window part of Dalitz region?
00104       if (m12VetoMin>max || m12VetoMax<min) m12VetoMin = m12VetoMax = -1;
00105       else {
00106         // Only consider veto window inside Dalitz region
00107         m12VetoMin = TMath::Max(m12VetoMin,min);
00108         m12VetoMax = TMath::Min(m12VetoMax,max);
00109       }
00110     }
00111 
00112     // Loop over m12 bins
00113     Int_t ybin = _hist.GetYaxis()->FindBin(_m13);
00114     for (Int_t xbin=1; xbin<=_hist.GetNbinsX(); xbin++) {
00115 
00116       // Calculate length of bin inside Dality region
00117       Double_t x1 = _hist.GetXaxis()->GetBinLowEdge(xbin);
00118       Double_t x2 = _hist.GetXaxis()->GetBinUpEdge(xbin);
00119       Double_t len = TMath::Min(x2,max)-TMath::Max(x1,min);
00120       if (len<0) len = 0;
00121 
00122       // Subtract veto window if neccessary
00123       if (len>0 && m12VetoMin>0 && m12VetoMax>0) {
00124         Double_t veto = TMath::Min(x2,m12VetoMax)-TMath::Max(x1,m12VetoMin);
00125         if (veto>0) len -= veto;
00126       }
00127 
00128       Double_t w = _hist.GetBinContent(xbin,ybin);
00129       r += w * len;
00130     }
00131   }
00132   else if (code==3) {
00133      // Dalitz boundaries
00134     Double_t max = m13Max(_m12);
00135     Double_t min = m13Min(_m12);
00136     //cout << "Dalitz boundaries at m12 = "<<_m12 << " are "<<min<<" to "<<max<<endl;
00137     if (max==0 || min==0) return 0;  // not in Dalitz region
00138 
00139     Double_t m13VetoMin = -1;
00140     Double_t m13VetoMax = -1;
00141     if (hasM23Veto()) {
00142       // Veto window boundaries in m13
00143       m13VetoMin = mOtherVal(_m12, m23VetoMax());
00144       m13VetoMax = mOtherVal(_m12, m23VetoMin());
00145       // Is veto window part of Dalitz region?
00146       if (m13VetoMin>max || m13VetoMax<min) m13VetoMin = m13VetoMax = -1;
00147       else {
00148         // Only consider veto window inside Dalitz region
00149         m13VetoMin = TMath::Max(m13VetoMin,min);
00150         m13VetoMax = TMath::Min(m13VetoMax,max);
00151       }
00152       //cout << "Veto window is "<<m13VetoMin<<" to "<<m13VetoMax<<endl;
00153     }
00154 
00155     // Loop over m13 bins
00156     Int_t xbin = _hist.GetXaxis()->FindBin(_m12);
00157     for (Int_t ybin=1; ybin<=_hist.GetNbinsY(); ybin++) {
00158 
00159       // Calculate length of bin inside Dality region
00160       Double_t y1 = _hist.GetYaxis()->GetBinLowEdge(ybin);
00161       Double_t y2 = _hist.GetYaxis()->GetBinUpEdge(ybin);
00162       Double_t len = TMath::Min(y2,max)-TMath::Max(y1,min);
00163       if (len<0) len = 0;
00164 
00165       // Subtract veto window if neccessary
00166       if (len>0 && m13VetoMin>0 && m13VetoMax>0) {
00167         Double_t veto = TMath::Min(y2,m13VetoMax)-TMath::Max(y1,m13VetoMin);
00168         if (veto>0) len -= veto;
00169       }
00170 
00171       Double_t w = _hist.GetBinContent(xbin,ybin);
00172       //cout << "xbin = "<<xbin<<"  ybin = "<<ybin<<"("<<y1<<","<<y2<<")"<<"  w = "<<w<<"  len = "<<len<<endl;
00173       r += w * len;
00174     }
00175   }
00176   else assert(0);
00177   
00178   //cout <<" = "<<r<<endl;
00179   return r;
00180 }
